description.value:
The Bastion represents the desire to protect, and the understanding that all forms of Defense can be used as a great offense. The Bastion's Shield exemplifies this need to protect others, and the lengths one will go to help them.

Constellation:Â @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.deities.Item.3PJqDBXSNoaagwY8]{The Bastion}

First Asterism (Level 1): You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield} cantrip as an innate spell. If you have the Shield cantrip already, or have a similar cantrip, you do not need to wait 10 minutes after using a Shield Block on the cantrip.

Second Asterism (Level 5): You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gMODOGamz88rgHuf]{Protection} as constellation spell.

Third Asterism (Level 9): You can cast @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.spells.Item.YAXoB2kjWCtuX7tH]{Safeguard} as a constellation spell.

Fourth Asterism (Level 13): You can cast Protection and Safeguard on creatures within 30 feet of you or if you have a meaningfully strong connection to them, such as from a Mystic's bond or a telepathic bond.
